name: Aircycle
description:
Aircycle is a flying, VR, exergame in which players fly a human powered aircraft through a canyon. By using a strap-on bluetooth sensor users directly affect the craft's speed through leg movement.

Design - Alexander Sheehy

Programming - Daniel Kharlamov, Bianca Jaramillo, and Romain Cevennement

3D Modeling - Damian Handzlik and Paweł Korczyński

Requires:

Android

VR Headset

Bluetooth

Floor pedals or stationary bicycle (optional)
